Action:
Optional.
Supported values: Add; Edit; Remove
Campaign status:
Optional.
Supported values: Enabled; Paused; Removed
Campaign type:
Required on create.
Supported values (Add): Search; Display; Video
Supported values (Edit): Unknown; Search; Display; Shopping; Video; App; Smart; Hotel; Demand Gen; Performance Max
Networks:
Optional.
Supported values: Google search; Search partners; Display Network; Google TV; YouTube videos
Budget type:
Optional.
Supported values: Daily; Campaign Total; Monthly
Bid strategy type:
Optional.
Supported values (Add): CPC (enhanced); Manual CPC; cpc; Viewable CPM; cpm; CPA (target); Maximize clicks; Target ROAS; Target CPA; Maximize Conversions; Maximize Conversion Value; Target CPC; Target CPM; CPC%; Target Impression Share; Commission; Invalid; Target Position; Share of voice; Target CPV; Fixed CPM
Supported values (Edit): CPC (enhanced); Manual CPC; cpc; Viewable CPM; cpm; Enhanced CPC; CPA (target); Target search page location; Maximize clicks; Target ROAS; Target CPA; Maximize Conversions; Maximize Conversion Value; Target Outranking Share; Target CPC; Target CPM; CPC%; Target Impression Share; Commission; Invalid; Target Position; Share of voice; Target CPV; Fixed CPM
Bid strategy:
Optional.
Portfolio bid strategy name, if applicable.
Example(s): my bid strategy
Supports remove_value
Location:
Optional.
Example(s): 20 | mi | Seattle, Washington, United States : -5% ; Taipei City, Taiwan : +10% ; Montréal, Québec, Canada ; 600 | km | Redmond, Washington, United States:removed
Supports remove_value
Exclusion:
Optional.
Example(s): 20 | mi | Seattle, Washington, United States ; Taipei City, Taiwan ; Montréal, Québec, Canada ; 600 | km | Redmond, Washington, United States:removed
Supports remove_value
Devices:
Optional.
Example(s): Computers:+10%; Mobile devices with full browsers:-5%; Tablets with full browsers:+15%
Label:
Optional.
Example(s): label 1; label 2; label 3 [123-456-7890]

Optional.
Required for creating Search campaigns in Google Ads Pharmaceutical Accounts.

Optional.

Optional.
